name: LYDIAN (Game Jam Version)
description:
On an unexplained journey, a mercenary takes some time while passing through the lively and intricate Kingdom of Lydia. 

(Still needs some time in the oven. This demo is a proof-of-concept!)

  • Created for the 2023 "Dependable Friend" Game Jam
  • Built with RPG Maker MZ by Riggy2k3
  • Graphics from Sidewinder91, the VIPRPG Material Storage, Liberty and Neosirris
  • Music and sound by Midnight Laboratory, bennymakesgames, and the FreeSound.org community
  • Additional programming by Casper Games, GabeMZ, gimmer, Hakuen Studio, MechPen, Mokusei Penguin, Sansuke Kannazuki, VisuStella, and ZainWD
